titles.title: Expressing support for dancing as a form of valuable exercise and artistic expression, and for the designation of July 26, 2014, as National Dance Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
7/11/2014--Introduced. Supports the designation of National Dance Day to celebrate the national commitment to dance education and physical fitness.
Acknowledges that dance is making an important contribution to health by encouraging physical fitness and reducing overweight and obesity.
Commends Nigel Lythgoe for his leadership in promoting National Dance Day.
